story.title: Super Max's First Day
story.summary: Sam discovers he has superpowers on his first day at a new school and learns that the greatest power is being kind and helping others.
scenes: Max waking up nervous about his first day at a new school
Accidentally using super strength to open his bedroom door too wide
Max's mom helping him practice controlling his new powers
Arriving at school and trying to act normal around other kids
Max's super hearing picking up someone crying for help
Finding a cat stuck high up in the school playground tree
Carefully using his flying power to rescue the scared cat
The other kids amazed and wanting to be Max's friend
Max helping a classmate who dropped all their books
Using super speed to help clean up after art class
A school bully picking on smaller children at recess
Max standing up to the bully using words instead of powers
Teaching the bully that being kind is much better than being mean
The former bully apologizing and asking to join their games
Max organizing a fun superhero play time for everyone
Helping the teacher carry heavy boxes without showing his strength
Max learning that small acts of kindness are the best superpowers
Making three new best friends who accept him just as he is
Max's mom proud of how he used his powers to help others
Max going to bed happy, excited for tomorrow's adventures
